portfolio.title: Street Care Now
portfolio.description: Passionate about technology for social impact! Contributing to Bright Mind Enrichment, I shape user-centric interfaces with ReactJS and sleek designs using Tailwind CSS. Firebase integration ensures seamless functionality, fostering robust community engagement.

portfolio.title: Quick Deal
portfolio.description: Built an advanced e-commerce site with HTML, JS, CSS, and PHP, featuring an intuitive catalog, secure authentication, and responsive design. Introduced 'Buy in Bulk' for enhanced user experience. Explore GitHub for innovative features.

portfolio.title: Virtual Workspace
portfolio.description: Virtual Workspace pioneers AR, empowering users to craft 3D models independently. Transform real-life objects into virtual counterparts, aiding informed decisions. Demonstrates my commitment to cutting-edge technology and user-centric solutions.
